prompt: Replace the words in the picture with their synonyms.
knowledge_prompt: Replace the words in the picture with their synonyms. According to the information in the picture, it is also easy to know that 'BRAND PERSONALITY & VISUAL BRANDING' and 'BRAND PERSONA & VISUAL IDENTITY' are synonyms. As can be seen from the semantic expectations, replace 'BRAND PERSONA & VISUAL IDENTITY' with 'BRAND PERSONALITY & VISUAL BRANDING' to meet the requirement.
